briefTitle: SMS Messaging as a Tool to Improve Cancer Screening Programs
officialTitle: Implementation of Text Messaging (SMS) as an Improvement Tool in Population-based Cancer Screening Programs
conditions: Mass Screening, Colorectal Cancer, Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Intervention 1: Participation in colorectal cancer screening program
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Eligible individuals for colorectal cancer screening (intervention 1 and 2)
* Eligible women for breast cancer screening (intervention 3)
* Registered at the HealthCare Database (RCA)

Exclusion Criteria:

* Individuals without a mobile phone number registered at the RCA
* Opt out from breast cancer screening and/or colorectal cancer screening
